bookroom

Class BookshelfGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • bookroom.BookshelfGroup

  • public class BookshelfGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a group of bookcases, particularly in retail settings.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cody

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double cycleRevenue
      How much revenue has been earned since last restock.
      private boolean needsRestock
      Whether the group needs restocking or not.
      private double percentRestock
      The threshold as a percentage for restocking the group as a decimal.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Bookshelf> shelves
      The collection of bookshelves as a map.

      • removeFirstInstanceOfBook

        public void removeFirstInstanceOfBook(long isbn)
                               throws BookDoesNotExistException
        Removes the first instance of the given book from the group of shelves.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The identifying number of the book to be removed.
        Throws:
        BookDoesNotExistException - If the book isn't found on any bookshelf in the group.
